promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young legendary deer dark-type pokemon wearing a purple cosmic crystal headband. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cosmstag, a a young legendary deer dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Pain Explosion. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "dark" or "Cosmstag". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, deer-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dark galaxy background
generatedDescription: Often found resting in ancient fortresses, this mystical fawn channels its sorrow into powerful energy blasts.
